PUBLIC

 

Dear Arun,

 

Thanks for the notification.

 

We have registered the claim under reference 23/MO/17387.

 

Please share the following:

*	Mention in your claim bill the product description
*	POD is clean, please advise as to when and where the shortage were noticed
*	Notice of discrepancy from the consignee upon receipt of the cargo.

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

Note: We are currently reviewing all claims in preparation for our year-end closing. Please expect delays in our responses. We regret for any inconvenience.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

Non Motor Claims Executive (Property & Casualty)
